Subject: Replace TLS certificate
Description: I have generated a new cert, and uploaded it and the corresponding key to the server. However, the certificate is installed without the accompying root certificate and issueing certificate authorities that were part of the certificate chain that I pasted into the server admin web page, which results in an untrusted certificate error being presented when accessing the site. Is there a separate place to upload certificate authorities? how do I get the entire certificate, including the CAs, imported into the server?
What_We_Know__c: The customer would like to replace the TLS Certificate
Next_Steps__c: As they were facing issues importing the certificate, I scheduled a remote session in order to assist them.
Solution_Comment__c: The certificate was replaced from the server's backend
